title: the Silver Valkyrie
intro: In the history of Everlight, no duo is as celebrated as Silver and Gold. As the elder sibling, Clair embodies the steadfast will of the Valorians, often being the first to drop into the thickest Hellspawn hives to create a safe zone for her comrades. Clad in enchanted silver plate, she is a blurring streak of moonlight on the battlefield. Clair doesn't just fight for glory; she fights to ensure every member of the Seventh Order returns home.

abilities.name: Silver Weave
abilities.details:
Whenever Clair casts an ability, she receives a stack of Silver Weave (maximum three), granting her a shield that lasts for a few seconds (expire duration is per stack, but shield value cannot be stacked).

Clair can walk to a nearby ally hero and transfer the Silver Weave stack to them, granting them a shield as well.

Enemy heroes can also receive a stack of Silver Weave, causing them to take bonus magical damage when attacked by ally heroes' basic attacks.

abilities.name: Gleaming Lance
abilities.details:
Clair thrusts her lance in a line, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to all enemies hit.

Enemy heroes struck by Gleaming Lance receive a stack of Silver Weave.

abilities.name: Argent Charge
abilities.details:
Clair targets an allied hero (or herself) and grants them a burst of movement speed. If Clair has a stack of Silver Weave on her, this ability will transfer one stack of Silver Weave to the target.

Using Argent Charge will generate a stack of Silver Weave due to Clair's passive, which can only be transferred after the cast (meaning this will not be transferred to the targeted ally via the casting of this ability).

abilities.name: Shimmer Burst
abilities.details:
Clair releases a burst of silver energy in a cone, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to all enemies hit and slowing them for a short duration.

If an enemy hit is marked with a stack of Silver Weave, they are stunned instead of slowed.

abilities.name: Sentinel's Embrace
abilities.details:
Clair channels briefly, then slams her lance down, creating a massive silver dome at her location that persists for several seconds.

While inside the dome, all allies and enemies are unable to be targeted by abilities or basic attacks, as well as being unable to use any abilities.

When allies exit the dome, they will receive a stack of Silver Weave.
